articles.title: Palo Alto's forecasts signal AI boost for cybersecurity tools, shares rise
articles.summary: Palo Alto Networks forecast fiscal 2026 revenue and profit above analysts' estimates on Monday, betting on growing demand for its artificial intelligence-powered cybersecurity solutions, sending its shares up 5% in extended trading.
articles.translated_title: Palo Alto's forecasts signal AI boost for cybersecurity tools, shares rise
articles.translated_summary: Palo Alto Networks forecast fiscal 2026 revenue and profit above analysts' estimates on Monday, betting on growing demand for its artificial intelligence-powered cybersecurity solutions, sending its shares up 5% in extended trading.

articles.title: Palo Alto's forecasts signals AI boost for cybersecurity tools
articles.summary: Palo Alto Networks forecast fiscal 2026 revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Monday, betting on growing demand for its artificial intelligence-powered cybersecurity solutions, sending its shares up nearly 5% in extended trading.
articles.translated_title: Palo Alto's forecasts signals AI boost for cybersecurity tools

articles.title: Exclusive: Arm hires Amazon AI exec to boost plans to build its own chips
articles.summary: Arm Holdings has hired Amazon.com artificial intelligence chip director Rami Sinno to bolster its plans to develop its own complete chips, a person familiar with the matter said on Monday.
articles.translated_title: Exclusive: Arm hires Amazon AI exec to boost plans to build its own chips
articles.translated_summary: Arm Holdings has hired Amazon.com artificial intelligence chip director Rami Sinno to bolster its plans to develop its own complete chips, a person familiar with the matter said on Monday.

articles.title: Exclusive: Arm hires Amazon AI chip director to aid in-house effort
articles.summary: Arm Holdings has hired former Amazon.com artificial intelligence chip director Rami Sinno to bolster its plans to develop its own complete chips, according to a person familiar with the matter.
articles.translated_title: Exclusive: Arm hires Amazon AI chip director to aid in-house effort

articles.title: As Meta Faces AI Scrutiny, Mounting Regulatory Risk Overshadows Strong Earnings And Pushes Stock Lower
articles.summary: Meta Platforms shares are trading lower Monday afternoon. The company is navigating a series of headwinds related to its artificial intelligence strategy.
articles.translated_title: As Meta Faces AI Scrutiny, Mounting Regulatory Risk Overshadows Strong Earnings And Pushes Stock Lower

articles.title: Philips CEO Jeff DiLullo on how AI is changing healthcare today
articles.summary: From faster MRI scans to earlier cancer diagnoses, Philips is betting big on artificial intelligence to transform patient care and ease the strain on clinicians.
articles.translated_title: Philips CEO Jeff DiLullo on how AI is changing healthcare today

articles.title: OpenAI's Sam Altman sees AI bubble forming as industry spending surges
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman thinks the artificial intelligence market is in a bubble, according to a report from The Verge published Friday.

articles.title: For Silicon Valley, falling behind in AI is a bigger threat than tariffs
articles.summary: If there's one thing the White House, Wall Street and Silicon Valley can agree on, it's that artificial intelligence is a top priority.

articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman warns of AI bubble, says investors are 'overexcited': report
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said he thinks the artificial intelligence market is in a bubble ‚Äì comparable to the dot-com crash of the early 2000s, according to a report.
